meanings.definition: A set of ten laws or principles, especially those given by a deity.
meanings.sent1: The decalog of the ancient civilization guided their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: The decalog of the land included rules for farming and trade.
meanings.sent3: The decalog of the forest creatures was to always share food with each other.
meanings.sent4: The decalog of the stars seemed to twinkle in agreement with each other.
meanings.sent5: The decalog of the wise owl was to always seek knowledge in the night.

meanings.definition: A list of ten things to be observed or followed.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's decalog for the students included completing homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The decalog of household chores was posted on the fridge for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The decalog of the mischievous cat involved knocking things off shelves for fun.
meanings.sent4: The decalog of the garden flowers was to bloom brightly under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The decalog of the playful puppies was to wag their tails when happy.
